enum.name: AbisSoState
enum.description: The different states for a Service Object (SO) in the Abis O&M G31 model.

enumMember.name: RESET
enumMember.description: Value used when the Abis Service Object is in state RESET. RESET is the initial state, which also is used by BSC to set the object in a defined state.

enumMember.name: STARTED
enumMember.description: Value used when the Abis Service Object is in state STARTED.

enum.name: AbisAoState
enum.description: The different states for an Application Object (AO) in the Abis O&M G31 model.

enumMember.name: RESET
enumMember.description: Value used when the Abis Application Object is in state RESET. RESET is the initial state, which also is used by BSC to set the object in a defined state with previous configuration cleared.

enumMember.name: DISABLED
enumMember.description: Value used when the Abis Application Object is in state DISABLE.

enumMember.name: ENABLED
enumMember.description: Value used when the Abis Application Object is in state ENABLE.

enumMember.name: DISABLED
enumMember.description: The resource is totally inoperable.

enumMember.name: ENABLED
enumMember.description: The resource is partially or fully operable.

enum.name: TfMode
enum.description: Synchronization mode in the Cluster Group of the TF AO in Abis model towards BSC. Normally a result of BSC actions on the Abis OML.

enum.name: AvailStatus
enum.description: The availability status is used to qualify the operational state. It indicates why the operational state has changed its value.

enumMember.name: IN_TEST
enumMember.description: The resource is undergoing a test procedure. If the administrative state is locked or shutting down, normal users are prevented from using the resource.

enumMember.name: FAILED
enumMember.description: The resource has an internal fault that prevents it from operating.

enumMember.name: POWER_OFF
enumMember.description: The resource requires power to be applied and is not powered on.

enumMember.name: OFF_LINE
enumMember.description: The resource requires a routine operation to be performed. This routine operation is to place the resource online and make it available for use. The operation may be manual or automatic, or both. The operational state is disabled.

enumMember.name: OFF_DUTY
enumMember.description: The resource has been made inactive by an internal control process.

enumMember.name: DEPENDENCY
enumMember.description: The resource cannot operate because some other resource on which it depends is unavailable.

enumMember.name: DEGRADED
enumMember.description: The service available from the resource is degraded in some respect.

enumMember.name: NOT_INSTALLED
enumMember.description: The resource represented by the managed object is not present, or is incomplete.

enumMember.name: LOG_FULL
enumMember.description: Indicates a log full condition. The semantics are defined in CCITT Rec. X.735 | ISO/IEC 10164-6.

enumMember.name: DEPENDENCY_LOCKED
enumMember.description: The administrative state of a resource that this resource depends on is locked. or the availability status of the other resource is dependency locked.

enumMember.name: DEPENDENCY_FAILED
enumMember.description: The availability status of a resource that this resource depends on is failed or dependency failed.

enumMember.name: DEPENDENCY_SHUTTINGDOWN
enumMember.description: The administrative state of a resource that this resource depends on is shutting down. or the availability status of the other resource is dependency shutting down.

enum.name: AbisOperCondition
enum.description: The different operational conditions for a MO in Abis model towards BSC.

enumMember.name: OPERATIONAL
enumMember.description: Normal condition. Abis MO is fully operational. Default after Abis MO is reset.

enumMember.name: DEGRADED
enumMember.description: Abnormal condition. Abis MO is partially operational; it performs normal service but with reduced functionality or performance.

enumMember.name: NOT_OPERATIONAL
enumMember.description: Abnormal condition. Abis MO is non-operational and cannot perform normal service.

enumMember.name: LOCKED
enumMember.description: The resource is administratively prohibited from performing services for its users.

enumMember.name: UNLOCKED
enumMember.description: The resource is administratively permitted to perform services for its users. This is independent of its inherent operability.

enumMember.name: SHUTTINGDOWN
enumMember.description: Use of the resource is administratively permitted to existing instances of use only. While the system remains in the shutting down state the manager may at any time cause the managed object to revert to the locked state.

enum.name: CombinedCellType
enum.description: The different types for a Combined Cell, defines network scenario related to Combined Cell. Extension antenna sites with extension TRXs are used to provide coverage in areas where Main antenna site fails to provide coverage. Normally, use the same CombinedCellType value for all TRX in a GsmSector.

enumMember.name: NON_COMBINED_CELL
enumMember.description: For TRX without ExtTrx children in combined cell configuration.

enumMember.name: COMBINED_CELL_TYPE1
enumMember.description: Combined cell with main antenna site that acts as dominant radio transmitter and defines outer cell coverage border. Radio propagation distance between extension antenna sites and main antenna site is shorter than 2 km.

enumMember.name: COMBINED_CELL_TYPE2
enumMember.description: Combined cell with main antenna site that acts as dominant radio transmitter and defines outer cell coverage border. Radio propagation distance between at least one extension antenna site and main antenna site is longer than 2 km.

enumMember.name: COMBINED_CELL_TYPE3
enumMember.description: Combined cell with no dominant main antenna site. Outer coverage border of combined cell is defined by aggregated coverage area of main and extension antenna sites. Distance between antenna sites in combined cell are relatively short, from few meters up to maximum distance of 2 km.

enumMember.name: COMBINED_CELL_TYPE4
enumMember.description: Combined cell with no dominant main antenna site and used for high speed train. Outer coverage border of combined cell is defined by aggregated coverage area in main and extension antenna sites. Maximum distance between neighboring antenna sites in combined cell is in the order of 1-2 Km.

enum.name: AbisLinkState
enum.description: The different states for the Abis links (OML/RSL).

enumMember.name: DOWN
enumMember.description: Value used when the Abis OML or RSL is not established or broken.

enumMember.name: UP
enumMember.description: Value used when the Abis OML or RSL is established.

class.name: BtsFunction
class.description: MO BtsFunction represents the GSM functionality in the Radio Node.

attribute.name: btsFunctionId
attribute.description: The value component of the RDN.

attribute.name: btsVersion
attribute.description: BTS Version is composed of: <Manufacturer Id><BTS Generation><BTS Revision><BTS Variant>. Used for fleet management by grouping different generations of BTS HW and to see which main GSM BSS SW level that is running.

attribute.name: gsmMcpaIpmCapacity
attribute.description: Used capacity units for the GSM MCPA Intelligent Power Management Baseband feature.

attribute.name: release
attribute.description: The product release of the GSM managed function.

attribute.name: userLabel
attribute.description: Label for free use.

class.name: GsmSector
class.description: A GSM Sector is a geographical area with GSM functionality. A GSM Sector is mapped to one Sector TG in BSC. The MO GsmSector groups a number of TRXs, each represented by a MO Trx. The GSM Sector is, via its TRXs, tied to one or more SectorEquipmentFunctions with the same antenna location and antenna direction. The GSM Sector can handle TRXs for one or more frequency bands. However one TRX is always single band and connected to one SectorEquipmentFunction. Transport related data is configured in the MO AbisIp.

attribute.name: gsmSectorId
attribute.description: The value component of the RDN. Sent to the BSC for Sector TG to GSM Sector correlation purposes.

attribute.name: userLabel
attribute.description: Label for free use.

attribute.name: abisScfState
attribute.description: State of the SCF SO in Abis model towards BSC. Normally a result of BSC actions on the Abis OML.

attribute.name: abisTfState
attribute.description: State of the TF AO in Abis model towards BSC. Normally a result of BSC actions on the Abis OML.

attribute.name: abisAtState
attribute.description: State of the Abis Transport (AT) Administration Object (AO) in Abis model towards BSC. Normally a result of BSC actions on the Abis OML.

attribute.name: abisScfOmlState
attribute.description: Link State (OML) between the SCF SO and the BSC.

attribute.name: bscNodeIdentity
attribute.description: BSC node identity received from BSC over the Abis interface.

attribute.name: bscTgIdentity
attribute.description: BSC TG identity received from BSC over the Abis interface.

attribute.name: abisClusterGroupId
attribute.description: Cluster Group ID of the TF AO in Abis model towards BSC. Normally a result of BSC actions on the Abis OML.

attribute.name: abisTfMode
attribute.description: Synchronization mode in the Cluster Group of the TF AO in Abis model towards BSC. Normally a result of BSC actions on the Abis OML.

attribute.name: abisAtOperCondition
attribute.description: Operational condition of AT AO in Abis model towards BSC.

attribute.name: abisScfOperCondition
attribute.description: Operational condition of SCF SO in Abis model towards BSC.

attribute.name: abisTfOperCondition
attribute.description: Operational condition of TF AO in Abis model towards BSC.

class.name: Trx
class.description: This MO represents a GSM TRX and corresponding functionality for a GSM carrier on Air interface. GSM uses narrowband (< 200 kHz bandwidth) channels in the air interface (one downlink and one uplink) handled by one TRX. A TRX handles normally 1 downlink carrier (TX) and 2 uplink carriers (RX) over a wide bandwidth by using frequency hopping. A MO Trx is connected to one SectorEquipmentFunction MO which represents the radio and antenna equipment.

attribute.name: trxId
attribute.description: The value component of the RDN. Recommended values: 0-11, to allow trxId and trxIndex (TEI) to have the same numeric value. (trxId numeric values >11 is converted to trxIndex <12)

attribute.name: administrativeState
attribute.description: The administrative state.
attribute.disturbances: Changing this attribute to LOCKED causes loss of traffic.

attribute.name: operationalState
attribute.description: Operational state.

attribute.name: availabilityStatus
attribute.description: The availability status. It contains details about operationalState.

attribute.name: userLabel
attribute.description: Label for free use.

attribute.name: abisRxState
attribute.description: State of the RX AO in Abis model towards BSC. Normally a result of BSC actions on the Abis OML.

attribute.name: abisTxState
attribute.description: State of TX AO in Abis model towards BSC. Normally a result of BSC actions on Abis OML.

attribute.name: abisTrxcOmlState
attribute.description: Link state (OML) between the SO TRXC and the BSC.

attribute.name: abisTrxcState
attribute.description: State of TRXC SO in Abis model towards BSC. Normally a result of BSC actions on Abis OML.

attribute.name: abisTrxRslState
attribute.description: Link state (RSL) between the TRX and the BSC.

attribute.name: abisTsState
attribute.description: According to the GSM standard a TRX has 8 TS numbered from 0 to 7 over Abis. Current state of TS AO in Abis Operation and Maintenance model towards BSC in the following order TS0, TS1, ..., TS6, TS7. Normally a result of BSC actions on the Abis OML.

attribute.name: arfcnMax
attribute.description: Highest frequency the TRX can use for a GSM carrier. Absolute Frequency Number (ARFCN) is a 3GPP defined attribute, which specifies a unique UL and DL frequency pair for each band. Frequency range specified by arfcnMin and arfcnMax must fit within the IBW of MCPA HW in the RUS.
attribute.dependencies: Frequency specified by arfcnMax must be higher than frequency specified by arfcnMin. Must match frequencyBand attribute for this TRX.

attribute.name: arfcnMin
attribute.description: Lowest frequency the TRX can use for a GSM carrier. Absolute Frequency Number (ARFCN) is a 3GPP defined attribute, which specifies a unique UL and DL frequency pair for each band. Frequency range specified by arfcnMin and arfcnMax must fit within the IBW of MCPA HW in the RUS.
attribute.dependencies: Frequency specified by arfcnMin must be lower than frequency specified by arfcnMax. Must match frequencyBand attribute for this TRX.

attribute.name: frequencyBand
attribute.description:
Used to configure TRX frequency band. The frequency bands are according to 3GPP TS 37.104, Operating bands and Band Categories, (Band 0 is Ericsson defined).
Possible Values: 0 = GSM 900 MHz (GSM) 2 = GSM 1900 MHz (PCS 1900) 3 = GSM 1800 MHz (DCS 1800) 5 = GSM 850 MHz (GSM 850) 8 = GSM 900 MHz Extended (E-GSM)
attribute.specification: 3GPP TS 37.104, Operating bands and Band Categories

attribute.name: noOfRxAntennas
attribute.description: Number of RX antennas used by the TRX.

attribute.name: noOfTxAntennas
attribute.description: Number of TX antennas used by the TRX.

attribute.name: trxIndex
attribute.description: Used both as OML L3 and OML/RSL/TFP/PGSL L2 address (TEI). Set to attribute trxId in this TRX if it is an unique number between 0..11 otherwise lowest unused number in range 0..11 is used. (Values 12-126 are reserved for future use)

attribute.name: sectorEquipmentFunctionRef
attribute.description: Reference to MO SectorEquipmentFunction instance, LDN. MO represents radio and antenna resources used by the TRX.
attribute.dependencies: The attribute frequencyBand in this TRX must match attribute eUtranFqBands in MO SectorEquipmentFunction.

attribute.name: configuredMaxTxPower
attribute.description: Configured absolute power for TRX (equally distributed over noOfTxAntennas).

attribute.name: maxTxPowerCapability
attribute.description: Power allocated for TRX, sum for noOfTxAntennas.

attribute.name: bscMaxTxPower
attribute.description: Amount of power requested for TRX (equally distributed over noOfTxAntennas) from the BSC.

attribute.name: rfBranchRxRef
attribute.description: A list of references to MOs RfBranch and CcBranch instances, LDNs. These MOs represent the RF branches the TRX shall use for RX. If no reference is specified carrier allocation is based on the rfBranchRef in MO SectorEquipmentFunction.
attribute.dependencies: Referenced RfBranch(es) or CcBranch(es) must belong to the same MO SectorEquipmentFunction that is referenced from this TRX.

attribute.name: rfBranchTxRef
attribute.description: List of references to MOs RfBranch instances, LDNs. MOs represents the RF branches (MCPA) TRX uses for TX. Used to group TRXs to a MCPA. If no reference is specified carrier allocation is based on the RF Branch MOM list, this is default behavior.
attribute.dependencies: Referenced RfBranch(es) must belong to the same MO SectorEquipmentFunction that is referenced from this TRX.

attribute.name: rfBranchTx
attribute.description: References to MO RfBranch(es) instances, LDN. MO represents RF branch (MCPA) TRX uses for TX. Identifies the RF branches (MCPA) for which PM counters are valid.

attribute.name: reservedMaxTxPower
attribute.description: Power reserved in MCPA for this TRX (equally distributed over noOfTxAntennas).
attribute.dependencies: Value must be equal or lower than attribute configuredMaxTxPower.
attribute.precondition: Feature GSM MCPA Intelligent Power Management Baseband must be active and administrativeState must equal LOCKED

attribute.name: abisRxOperCondition
attribute.description: Operational condition of RX AO in Abis model towards BSC.

attribute.name: abisTxOperCondition
attribute.description: Operational condition of TX AO in Abis model towards BSC.

attribute.name: abisTrxcOperCondition
attribute.description: Operational condition of TRXC SO in Abis model towards BSC.

attribute.name: abisTsOperCondition
attribute.description: Operational condition of TS AO in Abis model towards BSC.

attribute.name: rfBranchRx
attribute.description: References to MO RfBranch(es) instances, LDN. MO represents RF branch that TRX uses for RX. One reference per used RX RfBranch. Index vise the references can be interpreted as logical antennas.

attribute.name: rxImbAvgDeltaMeas2
attribute.description: Measured average delta imbalance between RX branches with index 2 and 3 in rfBranchRx attribute. Value updated every 5 minutes with traffic.

attribute.name: rxImbNoOfSamples2
attribute.description: Number of samples the rxImbAvgDeltaMeas2 is based on.

attribute.name: rxImbAvgDeltaMeas1
attribute.description: Measured average delta imbalance between RX branches with index 0 and 1 in rfBranchRx attribute. Value updated every 5 minutes with traffic.

attribute.name: rxImbNoOfSamples1
attribute.description: Number of samples the rxImbAvgDeltaMeas1 is based on.

attribute.name: rxImbSupTimeElapsed
attribute.description: Time elapsed of the supervision window time.

attribute.name: rxImbSupWindowSize
attribute.description: Time over which RX path imbalance value is averaged in the supervision function.

attribute.name: rxImbMinNoOfSamples
attribute.description: Minimum required number of samples within the supervision window to raise/cease a fault.

attribute.name: rxImbAlarmThreshold
attribute.description: Imbalance between RX branches required to raise/cease of a fault with severity MINOR.

attribute.name: combinedCellType
attribute.description: Used to configure Combined Cell Type for TRX in a Combined Cell configuration.

class.name: AbisIp
class.description: MO AbisIp handles configuration of L2TP tunnels for GSM Sector. The L2TP tunnels carry Abis traffic over the IP transport network between the GSM Sector and BSC.

attribute.name: administrativeState
attribute.description: The administrative state.
attribute.disturbances: Changing this attribute to LOCKED causes loss of traffic, due to lost communication to BSC.

attribute.name: abisIpId
attribute.description: The value component of the RDN.

attribute.name: userLabel
attribute.description: Label for free use.

attribute.name: operationalState
attribute.description: Operational state of the L2TP control connection.

attribute.name: availabilityStatus
attribute.description: The availability status of L2TP control connection. It contains details about operationalState.

attribute.name: bscBrokerIpAddress
attribute.description: BSC IP address the GSM Sector contacts when initial contact is made.

attribute.name: peerIpAddress
attribute.description: IP address GSM Sector is connected to. Is different from bscBrokerAddress if L2TP connection was redirected.

attribute.name: gsmSectorName
attribute.description: gsmSectorName is used as identification when BSC is contacted. The gsmSectorName is sent as attribute HostName in L2TP message SCCRQ. The same name must be configured in the BSC. Default gsmSectorName is the same as gsmSectorId, last 20 characters.

attribute.name: dscpSectorControlUL
attribute.description: DSCP code for L2TP control connection between the RBS and BSC.

attribute.name: keepAlivePeriod
attribute.description: Number of seconds between L2TP keep-alive procedures.

attribute.name: maxRetransmission
attribute.description: Maximum number of retransmissions of L2TP control messages.

attribute.name: retransmissionCap
attribute.description: Maximum value of the exponentially increased interval between retransmission of L2TP control messages.

attribute.name: initialRetransmissionPeriod
attribute.description: Initial period from the original transmission to the first retransmission of L2TP control messages.

attribute.name: ipv4Address
attribute.description: Reference to the MO AddressIPv4 which represents the IPv4 address which the GSM Sector uses.

class.name: ExtTrx
class.description: GSM extension TRX functionality on extension antenna site in a combined cell configuration. Extension antenna sites are used to provide coverage in areas where Main antenna site fails to provide coverage.

attribute.name: operationalState
attribute.description: Operational state.

attribute.name: availabilityStatus
attribute.description: The availability status. It contains details about operationalState.

attribute.name: sectorEquipmentFunctionRef
attribute.description: Reference to MO SectorEquipmentFunction instance, LDN. MO represents radio and antenna resources used by the extension TRX.
attribute.dependencies: The attribute frequencyBand in parent main TRX which is also used for this extension TRX must match attribute eUtranFqBands in MO SectorEquipmentFunction.
attribute.precondition: administrativeState of parent main TRX must equal LOCKED

attribute.name: extTrxId
attribute.description: The value component of the RDN. Recommendation: naming convention for extTrxId: extTrxId=<antSiteIndex>_<parent main trxIndex>

attribute.name: configuredMaxTxPower
attribute.description: Configured absolute power for this extension TRX.
attribute.precondition: administrativeState of parent main TRX must equal LOCKED

attribute.name: reservedMaxTxPower
attribute.description: Power reserved in MCPA for this extension TRX.
attribute.dependencies: Value must be equal or lower than attribute configuredMaxTxPower.
attribute.precondition: Feature GSM MCPA Intelligent Power Management Baseband must be active; and administrativeState of parent main TRX must equal LOCKED

attribute.name: maxTxPowerCapability
attribute.description: Power allocated for extension TRX.

attribute.name: rfBranchRx
attribute.description: References to MO RfBranch(es) instances, LDN. MO represents RF branch that extension TRX uses for RX. One reference per used RX RfBranch. Index vise the references can be interpreted as logical antennas.

attribute.name: rfBranchRxRef
attribute.description: A list of references to MOs RfBranch and CcBranch instances, LDNs. These MOs represent the RF branches the extension TRX shall use for RX. If no reference is specified carrier allocation is based on the rfBranchRef in MO SectorEquipmentFunction.
attribute.dependencies: Referenced RfBranch(es) or CcBranch(es) must be referenced by the same MO SectorEquipmentFunction that is referenced from this extension TRX.
attribute.precondition: administrativeState of parent main TRX must equal LOCKED

attribute.name: rfBranchTx
attribute.description: References to MO RfBranch(es) instances, LDN. MO represents RF branch (MCPA) the extension TRX uses for TX. Identifies the RF branches (MCPA) for which PM counters are valid.

attribute.name: rfBranchTxRef
attribute.description: List of references to MOs RfBranch instances, LDNs. MOs represents the RF branches (MCPA) the extension TRX uses for TX. Used to group extension TRXs to a MCPA. If no reference is specified carrier allocation is based on the RF Branch MOM list, this is default behavior.
attribute.dependencies: Referenced RfBranch(es) must be referenced by the same MO SectorEquipmentFunction that is referenced from this extension TRX.
attribute.precondition: administrativeState of parent main TRX must equal LOCKED

attribute.name: rxImbAlarmThreshold
attribute.description: Imbalance between RX branches required to raise/cease of a fault with severity MINOR.
attribute.precondition: administrativeState of parent main TRX must equal LOCKED

attribute.name: rxImbAvgDeltaMeas1
attribute.description: Measured average delta imbalance between RX branches with index 0 and 1 in rfBranchRx attribute. Value updated every 5 minutes with traffic.

attribute.name: rxImbMinNoOfSamples
attribute.description: Minimum required number of samples within the supervision window to raise/cease a fault.
attribute.precondition: administrativeState of parent main TRX must equal LOCKED

attribute.name: rxImbNoOfSamples1
attribute.description: Number of samples the rxImbAvgDeltaMeas1 is based on.

attribute.name: rxImbSupTimeElapsed
attribute.description: Time elapsed of the supervision window time.

attribute.name: rxImbSupWindowSize
attribute.description: Time over which RX path imbalance value is averaged in the supervision function.
attribute.precondition: administrativeState of parent main TRX must equal LOCKED

attribute.name: userLabel
attribute.description: Label for free use.

attribute.name: extTrxDistance
attribute.description: Radio propagation distance between main antenna site and extension antenna site.
attribute.precondition: administrativeState of parent main TRX must equal LOCKED

attribute.name: extTrxRadius
attribute.description: Planned size of the downlink radio coverage area for extension site expressed as an Equal signal strength radius. Equal signal strength radius is the distance from extension antenna site at which an MS is expected to receive equal signal strength contributions from main antenna site and extension antenna site if both main TX and extension TX are sending with nominal TX power.
attribute.precondition: administrativeState of parent main TRX must equal LOCKED

attribute.name: extAntSiteIndex
attribute.description: Used for identifying a Extension Antenna Site in Combined cells site statistics in BSC and OSS/ENM. Normally use the same extAntSiteIndex value for all MO ExtTrx instances on an Extension Antenna Site. Recommended values 1..7. Value 0 is reserved for Main Antenna Site. Not recommended values 0 and 8..63 will be changed to 7, and these changes will affect PM data from BSC to OSS/ENM. Recommendation: Also to be used together with trxIndex attribute of parent main Trx in naming convention for extTrxId. extTrxId=<extAntSiteIndex>_<parent main trxIndex>.
attribute.precondition: administrativeState of parent main TRX must equal LOCKED

attribute.name: antSiteIndex
attribute.description: Used for identifying an Extension Antenna Site in Combined cells site statistics in BSC and OSS/ENM. Normally use the same antSiteIndex value for all MO ExtTrx instances on an Extension Antenna Site. Recommendation: Also to be used together with trxIndex attribute of parent main Trx in naming convention for extTrxId. extTrxId=<antSiteIndex>_<parent main trxIndex>.
attribute.precondition: administrativeState of parent main TRX must equal LOCKED
